name: Root to Treasure
description:
Concept

The game "Root to Treasure"  is a unique take on the theme of heritage and lineage. In the game, players take on the role of a historian who was hired to determine the forefather of a client of yours, this forefather also happens to be a pirate with a hidden treasure stash! 

The objective of the game is to match the initial human character with their father's character based on a series of facial features and determine the full lineage of the original character. There are 17 million different possible characters!

Guide
  • Pay attention to all facial details (Don't forget jewelry!)
  • Use mouse or arrow keys to switch between documents
  • And find the long-lost pirate's treasure!
  • Headphones are recommended
Controls
  • Move with Mouse or Arrow keys
  • Enter to confirm decision
Use Headphones!
